channel.title: Abouts on Kev's 9th blog
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Kev's 9th blog

item.description: (Game) Server Engineer with a current focus on Golang, Kubernetes and Cloud-Native DevOps. ExperienceExperience Senior Server EngineerSenior Server Engineer Tencent America · Full-time Aug 2018 - Present · 4 yrs 6 mos Greater Los Angeles Area Recently working on a seamless large-scale massively multiple player online game solution based on Unreal Engine, I’d rather not call it a ‘Metaverse’, cuz it’s actually not. As a server engineer, keep working on multi-server networking solution that enables differentiating features like the blended PvP/PvE gameplay.
